channel.title: Auto resize does not work on fedora 29
channel.description: So I installed KVM in fedora 29 the issue I have is Whonix does not resize itself at all even with the proper settings turned on.

item.title: Auto resize does not work on fedora 29
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Resize as in become full screen when window is maximized? This is a known problem on KDE on the host. Nothing I can do Iâ€™m afraid. You might want to report it upstream. I can post the bug report links if you are interested.
